title: Preet Gill – 2021 Comments on UK’s Aid Spend
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Preet Gill, the Shadow Secretary of State for International Development, on 8 April 2021.
content:
In the middle of a global pandemic, this callous Conservative government chose to slash hundreds of millions of pounds of life saving humanitarian assistance.
